code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'../stylesheets/Taskbar.css';import logo from'../assets/img/logo.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Taskbar(){var location=useLocation();var getLinkClassName=function getLinkClassName(path){var isActive=location.pathname===path;return"taskbar-button taskbar-item ".concat(isActive?'active':'');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"taskbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"SadLogo",className:"logo-image taskbar-item"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/about",className:getLinkClassName('/about'),children:"About"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/resume",className:getLinkClassName('/resume'),children:"Resume"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/academics",className:getLinkClassName('/academics'),children:"Academics"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/articles",className:getLinkClassName('/articles'),children:"Articles"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/wiki",className:getLinkClassName('/wiki'),children:"Wiki"})]});}export default Taskbar;
